title: How to Make Idli Upma

steps.headline: Cut/chop the onions into fine cubes or dice the onion.
Cut or chop the green chillies.
Put a pan on the stove.
steps.description: Add 2 teaspoons of oil. Allow it to heat up for 2 to 3 minutes.

steps.headline: After heating the oil, add the onions.
steps.description: Temper until the onions turn slightly brown in color.

steps.headline: Add the chopped green chillis and mix it well.
Meanwhile, take some idlis and cut them into pieces (medium pieces; not too big or not too small).
Add the idlis to the onions.
Add salt, pepper powder and turmeric powder (optional) to the idlis.
Add Daniya leaves to add more flavour to the upma.

text: Cut/chop the onions into fine cubes or dice the onion. Keep aside in a bowl. Cut or chop the green chillies. Keep these aside. Put a pan on the stove. Add 2 teaspoons of oil. Allow it to heat up for 2 to 3 minutes. After heating the oil, add the onions. Temper until the onions turn slightly brown in color. Add the chopped green chillis and mix it well.  Meanwhile, take some idlis and cut them into pieces (medium pieces; not too big or not too small).  Add the idlis to the onions. Mix it well. Add salt, pepper powder and turmeric powder (optional) to the idlis. Mix it well. Add Daniya leaves to add more flavour to the upma.  Finished!
